refnamediv.refpurpose: Print an ASN.1 stream to stdout

para.programlisting:
#include <opensc.h>
void sc_asn1_print_tags(const unsigned char *buf, size_t buflen);

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function prints the ASN.1 stream pointed to by buf, which is of size buflen, to stdout. This is useful for debugging.
